helpgrid.innerhtml: To find labor available during a specific date range, enter the dates in the Available From and To fields. To see labor available on a specific shift, enter the Shift. To include labor who are already assigned to other jobs, select Include Assigned Labor.
This table displays a list of PMs that require alerting. Select PMs to create Work Orders.

The following assets and locations are safety-related assets for the current release. Each asset might have safety hazards that affect the work environment of the current release. Pick one or more hazards to Apply to Release. To finish, click Done

The first table displays Labor and Cost information for the current Release and all of its tasks. The second table displays Labor and Cost information for the entire Release hierarchy starting from the current Release.

The first table displays Price and Cost information for the current Work Order and all of its tasks. The second table displays Price and Cost information for the entire Work Order hierarchy starting from the current Work Order.
